entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
